metadata.dc:author: Valcuende Cavero, F
Martinez Ojeda, L
Ramirez Bosca, A
Massmanian, A
Castells Rodellas, A
metadata.dc:description: Lectins are used to study four cases of keratosis pilaris, four of lichen spinulosus, 11 of porokeratosis, 8 of striated lichen and one case of pityriasis rubra pilaris, with the aim of providing data to improve knowledge of the histogenesis of these processes.
metadata.dc:title: Marcaje mediante lectinas de trastornos en la queratinizaci√≥n. II. Queratosis pilaris, liquen espinuloso, poroqueratosis, liquen estriado y pitiriasis rubra pilaris.
[Marking disorders of keratinization by means of lectins. II. Keratosis pilaris, lichen spinulosus, porokeratosis, lichen striatus and pityriasis rubra pilaris].
